title: The Valentine's Day Mystery
description: In this Dateline classic, a prominent doctor’s wife is murdered on Valentine’s day. Investigators had plenty of theories to work with, but the suspect they brought into custody shocked everyone. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 26, 2010.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
